Name: Big Boss Cat
Content:
Ah welcome human intern, it is time for your performance review.
Wow it seems you managed to complete all your tasks and have recieved rave reviews from your coworkers!
The Company is so impressed with your abilities, that company board has unanimously decided to use the brain scans we have been covertly taking from you to train our new AI employees.
Please know that the company and our shareholders appreciate all the hard work you've done, as a rewards it has been decided that you should be to first to know that you and all the other employees are being layed off effective immediately.
Everyone else will only learn about this tomorrow, so you get first dibs on stealing anything you want from the office before we tear it all down, I have dibs on the printer though.
